meanings.definition: Excess fat or loose skin on a person's body.
meanings.sent1: She felt self-conscious about the flab on her stomach.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise can help reduce flab and improve overall health.
meanings.sent3: The flab on his arms jiggled as he waved.
meanings.sent4: After the holidays, the extra flab around her waist was noticeable.
meanings.sent5: The doctor advised her to watch her diet to avoid accumulating flab.

meanings.sent1: The puppy had a cute, flab belly that jiggled when he ran.
meanings.sent2: She preferred firm muscles over flab on her body.
meanings.sent3: The flab texture of the cake made it melt in your mouth.
meanings.sent4: His flab cheeks made him look like a chipmunk storing nuts.
meanings.sent5: The flab skin of the fruit indicated it was overripe.
